    • SpaceShipTile

      public SpaceShipTile(int id, List<Type_side_connector> connectorList, SSTTypes types)
      Constructor for the SpaceShipTile class.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the spaceship tile.
      connectorList - A list of connectors associated with the tile, defined by the Type_side_connector enumeration.
      types - The type of the spaceship tile, based on the SSTTypes enumeration.

      public ShipBoard getAttachedShip()
      Retrieves the ShipBoard instance currently attached to this SpaceShipTile.
      Returns:
      the attached ShipBoard, or null if no ShipBoard is attached

    • Rotate90right

      public void Rotate90right()
      Rotates the SpaceShipTile 90 degrees to the right. If the tile is flipped (represented by the isFlipped field being true), the rotation field is updated to reflect the new rotation by adding 90 degrees to its current value and using modulo 360 to ensure it stays within valid bounds (0-359 degrees). Independently of the isFlipped state, the method rotates the order of elements in the connectorList field, shifting them one position forward. This corresponds to the physical rotation of connectors around the tile.

    • Flip

      public void Flip()
      Toggles the flip state of the SpaceShipTile object. If the tile is currently flipped, this method will unflip it, and vice versa.

    • SetFlip

      public void SetFlip(boolean isFlipped)
      Sets the flipped state of the SpaceShipTile.
      Parameters:
      isFlipped - a boolean indicating whether the tile should be flipped (true if flipped, false otherwise)

    • getType

      public SSTTypes getType()
      Retrieves the type of the spaceship tile.
      Returns:
      the type of the spaceship tile represented by an SSTTypes enum value

    • getTileBattCapacity

      public int getTileBattCapacity() throws RuntimeException
      Retrieves the battery capacity of the tile.
      Returns:
      the battery capacity of the tile as an integer
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if battery capacity is not available

    • CheckCorrectPositioning

      public int CheckCorrectPositioning(int row, int column) throws Exception
      Checks the positioning of a tile at the specified row and column within the ship's matrix. Determines if the tile placement respects all constraints and connectivity rules. If the placement is invalid, appropriate corrective actions might be suggested or taken.
      Parameters:
      row - the row index of the tile being checked
      column - the column index of the tile being checked
      Returns:
      an integer status code indicating the result of the check: 1 - Positioning is correct and valid. -1 - Positioning is incorrect, requires corrective action or selection of tiles to remove.
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error during the checking or processing of the tile's positioning

    • getNumPassengers

      public int getNumPassengers() throws RuntimeException
      Retrieves the number of passengers currently associated with the spaceship tile.
      Returns:
      the number of passengers present in the tile
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the method is not supported or implemented

    • removePassenger

      public void removePassenger(int removable) throws Exception

      Throws:

    • addAlien

      public void addAlien(boolean wantalien, AlienColor color, int row, int column) throws Exception
      Adds an alien to the designated position on the spaceship tile.
      Parameters:
      wantalien - Determines if an alien should be added. True to add an alien, false to skip the operation.
      color - Specifies the color of the alien to be added. Possible values are defined in the AlienColor enum.
      row - The row index where the alien should be added. Must be a valid row within the spaceship tile.
      column - The column index where the alien should be added. Must be a valid column within the spaceship tile.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the operation fails due to constraints or invalid arguments.

    • removeAlien

      public void removeAlien() throws Exception
      Removes an alien from the spaceship tile. The implementation of this method is not supported yet.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the operation cannot be performed or is unsupported.

    • RechargeAll

      public void RechargeAll() throws RuntimeException
      Recharges all chargeable components of the spaceship tile to their full capacity. This method is intended to ensure that all charges for the spaceship tile or its attached components are fully replenished. It does not currently contain a specific implementation and will throw an exception when invoked.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the method is invoked, as it is not supported yet.
